statements: SELECT * FROM researcherCodingData;
SELECT researcher_id, code_id, coding_frequency FROM researcherCodingData WHERE researcher_id = 123;
SELECT code_id, code_description FROM researcherCodingData WHERE coding_frequency > 5 ORDER BY coding_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM researcherCodingData ORDER BY code_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT code_id FROM researcherCodingData;
SELECT * FROM researcherCodingData WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT code_id, code_description, coding_frequency FROM researcherCodingData WHERE coding_frequency > 10 ORDER BY coding_frequency DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, code_id, code_description FROM researcherCodingData WHERE code_description LIKE '%qualitative%' AND coding_frequency BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT researcher_id, COUNT(DISTINCT code_id) AS unique_codes FROM researcherCodingData GROUP BY researcher_id ORDER BY unique_codes DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, SUM(coding_frequency) AS total_frequency FROM researcherCodingData GROUP BY researcher_id HAVING total_frequency > 50;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, code FROM researchers JOIN code_frequencies ON researchers.researcher_id = code_frequencies.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM code_frequencies WHERE frequency > 10;
SELECT code, COUNT(*) FROM code_frequencies GROUP BY code ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University A';
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT code, frequency FROM code_frequencies WHERE researcher_id = 1 ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, code, frequency FROM researchers r JOIN code_frequencies cf ON r.researcher_id = cf.researcher_id WHERE affiliation = 'Company B' ORDER BY frequency ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT researcher_id) AS total_researchers FROM code_frequencies WHERE frequency > 10;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_interests FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT data_text FROM QualitativeData WHERE research_type = 'Qualitative';
SELECT data_text, research_type FROM QualitativeData WHERE data_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, code_text, frequency FROM Researchers INNER JOIN CodeFrequency ON Researchers.researcher_id = CodeFrequency.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM Researchers WHERE research_interests = 'Machine Learning';
SELECT researcher_name, research_interests FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT data_text, research_type FROM QualitativeData WHERE data_id = 10 ORDER BY research_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM CodeFrequency WHERE code_text LIKE '%code%' ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT data_text FROM coding_data WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_analysis WHERE code_frequency > 5;
SELECT researcher_name, analysis_result FROM researchers JOIN coding_data ON researchers.researcher_id = coding_data.researcher_id JOIN data_analysis ON coding_data.data_id = data_analysis.data_id;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_id FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT researchers.researcher_name, code_categories.category_name FROM researchers INNER JOIN code_categories ON researchers.researcher_id = code_categories.category_id;
SELECT researcher_name, category_name, description FROM researchers, code_categories WHERE researchers.researcher_id = code_categories.category_id;
SELECT data_text, analysis_result FROM coding_data INNER JOIN data_analysis ON coding_data.data_id = data_analysis.data_id WHERE code_frequency > 5;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_id FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM CodingProjects GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT r.researcher_name, c.project_name FROM Researchers r JOIN CodingProjects c ON r.researcher_id = c.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM ResearchResults WHERE result_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Researchers
SELECT researcher_name FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM CodingProjects WHERE researcher_id = 2
SELECT code_name, frequency FROM CodeFrequencies
SELECT result_id, result_description FROM ResearchResults
